restructured_question: Check ROH Material in MARA_500 table and IF matching Entries found, then bring MTART field from MARA_500 table to the Target Table ELSE, If no entries found in MARA_500, then check ROH Material ( found in Transformation 2 ) in MARA_700 Table and bring the MTART ELSE, bring the MTART from MARA table

transformation_history.description: Extracted Material Number where Material Type is ROH
Get Material Type from MARA_500 if ROH Material exists. Else, Get Material Type from MARA_700 if ROH Material exists. Else, Get Material Type from MARA table.
